General.Name: SVI Public Company Limited
General.Description: SVI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronic manufacturing services in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Industrial Control System, Communication Network, and Automotive & Transportation. The company provides design and development services; new product introduction services; and test development and supply chain services. It also produces full box-build and system build product solutions. In addition, the company engages in the vertically integrated solutions, such as cable assembly, plastic injection molding, metal stamping, sheet metal fabrication, etc. Further, it provides automation and failure analysis lab services; and raw material sourcing services. The company offers its services to communication and data technology; optical; automotive and e-mobility; medtech and healthcare; clean energy; audio video and security; aerospace; and industrial and automation sectors. SVI Public Company Limited was formerly known as Semiconductor Venture International Limited. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.
